item.title: HAIN CELESTIAL GROUP INC 10-K
item.description: HAIN CELESTIAL GROUP INC, which is in the Food & Kindred Products [2000] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 25, 2022 had 32853 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
